name: Mr Fischer
description:
Description

This game was developped by some students during a training. It uses the Python arcade' game library.

The goal is to control a little cute penguin trying to catch all the fishes falling from above its head. Just move the penguin to catch the fishes falling from above.

If you miss a fish, you lose a life point. When you got no more life point, the game is finished. You earn one point for each fish you can catch.

Try to go as far as you can !

Controls

Just move the penguin toward LEFT/RIGHT using either the keyboard arrows or any gamepad controller.

You can press the SPACE key or any button on the gamepad to slide the penguin toward the direction you are currently facing. It allows you to save some time and avoid missing a fish.

Download

Repository

The GIT repository is available here.
